title: Peach Payments Partners with MoneyBadger to Enable Crypto Payments for SA Merchants
description: Sixty-eight percent of South Africans own or have bought Bitcoin—one of the highest adoption rates globally. For merchants, accepting Bitcoin and crypto payments attracts a young, tech-savvy 18-34 year-old demographic, which has growing purchasing power.
